com.versusoft.packages.jodl
Class OdtUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.versusoft.packages.jodl.OdtUtils

public class OdtUtils
extends java.lang.Object

OdtUtils.java: convert zipped odt to flat odt xml. It provide also some nice fonctions

Author:
Vincent Spiewak
